name: fsa-workforce-management-information
title: FSA Workforce Management Information
description: Monthly information on staff numbers and paybill costs in the FSA, both payroll and non-payroll including consultants. Split between full-time equivalents (FTE) and headcount and mapped to standard Civil Service grades. Costs are broken down by salaries, allowances and contributions, or costs for consultancy.
